input.sentences: [male] knew halloween was going to rock .
[male] and [female] went for the crazy-eyed look .
the friends went to a party at the hotel .
output.sentences: On Halloween there was a male dressed as a female in a rock band.
The makeup on the male was scary.
The male and female eyed each other.
The female had a great costume.
After the Halloween party there was another party at the hotel just for friends.
